Dietrich Boschung & Jan N. Bremmer (edd.), The Materiality of Magic = Morphomata. 20 (Paderborn, 2015) pp. 23-58.

Traces the long history of textual amulets in ancient Egypt. Their origin and subsequent developments are reconstructed through a study of the materials used for their production. A typology for textual amulets made of papyrus, which is based on physical and formal characteristics of the preserved artifacts, is presented. - Avec résumé en anglais.
